name: heat wave (itch)
description:
//
~~about~~
created in 72 hours for the ludumdDare 49 game jam: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/ignight
//
heat wave is a turn-based, survival sim, solitaire card game. where every card you play has a direct impact on your village. 
//
~~goal~~
get the highest score possible. earn one point for every villager currently alive.
//
~~how~to~play~~
1. choose to either play a card, or "seek help". after playing a card, you will automatically draw a new card. 
2. each card played will have a direct impact on the fire's fuel, heat, wind, & water.
3. survive for as long as possible.
//
~~controls~~
f11 ~ toggle fullscreen.
f1 ~ toggle help tips.
esc ~ return to menu.
mouse ~ hover over cards & buttons.
left mouse click ~ interact with cards & buttons.
//
